title: Wind Cave National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Items Worn at Other Caves Not Allowed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Items Worn at Other Caves Not Allowed  To prevent the spread of White-nose Syndrome among bats do not wear shoes, clothing, or bring any gear into Wind Cave that have been in another cave. more
